item.description: Whitestone is a material that has special properties and is used to make [[Whitestone#Residuum]] Also: A city in [[Talâ€™Dorei]] known for the stone with the same name Residuum Residuum is a material that can substitute material components for spells A pound of Residuum is worth about 15.
